author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
They did it. Ducktopia Labs finally managed to contain the universe’s most dangerous material – Strange Matter – and now it can be yours. Collect this ultra rare, glow-in-the-dark pin, and get a truly special piece of kurzgesagt in exchange for your support 💚
But hurry! Pre-orders close in 24 hours at 4pm CEST / 10am EDT on Friday 9th May.
Grab yours now, only on the kurzgesagt shop: https://shop.kgs.link/Strange-LTD
